title: Brainstorm: Help users write better prompt.md files
description:
The actor-critic system correctly evaluates what's in the prompt, but users may write incomplete prompts (missing documentation requirements, test requirements, etc.). Explore ways to help users write more complete prompts:

Options to explore:
1. Prompt templates with checklists (docs, tests, verification steps)
2. A 'codeloops lint' command that scans prompt.md for common omissions
3. Structured prompt format (YAML/TOML) with explicit requirements section
4. Pre-flight check that asks user 'Did you include X, Y, Z?'
5. Integration with the brainstorming skill to help refine prompts before execution

Context: A recent session completed successfully but missed documentation updates because they weren't included in prompt.md despite being discussed in the planning conversation.
